content:
This is a left over from the OCT publishing of Version 3.1.0

The LOINC Part code that we call out here are failing in the instance validation:

for https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/US-Core-R4/DiagnosticReport-chest-xray-report.html

e.g.

for https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/US-Core-R4/DiagnosticReport-chest-xray-report.html

DiagnosticReport/chest-xray-report: DiagnosticReport.category[0].coding[0] (l16/c8) error   The code "LP29684-5" is not valid in the system http://loinc.org; The code provided (http://loinc.org#LP29684-5) is not valid in the value set All codes known to the system for "http://loinc.org#LP29684-5"
this should be fixed now (and LOINC upgraded to 2.68) but you will probably have to clear out your tx cache to get the fix.
